question: When does Michael Stonebraker publish the first VLDB paper ?
query: SELECT DISTINCT t3.year FROM venue AS t4 JOIN paper AS t3 ON t4.venueid = t3.venueid JOIN writes AS t2 ON t2.paperid = t3.paperid JOIN author AS t1 ON t2.authorid = t1.authorid WHERE t1.authorname = 'Michael Stonebraker' AND t4.venuename = 'VLDB' ORDER BY t3.year NULLS FIRST
